name: GeoDoku
description:
GeoDoku is like the original Sudoku a puzzle game that trains your brain! Instead of having numbers, as the Sudoku, we have replaced them with geometric figures, that makes it a little bit more funny to solve the puzzle.

GeoDoku offers 4 different layouts:

- Geometrical layout
- Sudoku layout
- Letter layout
- Colored bullets layout

GeoDoku offers the following features:  
- over 11,000 GeoDoku puzzles, that is nearly unlimited fun (purchased app only)
 - choose from five difficulty levels, from very easy to evil
- detail results on your played games
- Settings allows you to show or hide advance in the game, game timer and play sounds.  

If you like GeoDoku you can unlock the puzzle generator for nearly unlimited GeoDoku fun via In-App Purchase.
